授業方法: This is a seminar based course. The completion of weekly assignments by students is a must.

トピック.授業計画1:
This is a students-led seminar based course. Active participation of students is expected.

1. Introduction
2. Marxist Theory
3. Case Studies 1
4. Power Elite Theory
5. Case Studies 2
6. Pluralist Theory
7. Case Studies 3
8. Statist Theory
9. Case Studies 4
10. Political Culture
11. Bureaucratic Politics
12. Rational Decision-Making
13. Major Issues in Comparative Politics
14. Course Review and Evaluation
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to complete weekly assignments and a research paper at the end of the semester.

評価.学生による授業評価の方法Course Evaluation by Student: Course evaluation will be conducted at the end of the semester.
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
評価.成績評価Grading2:
備考　Note
(1) In class Assignments: 50%
(3) Final Research Essay: 50%

name: 【700】比較政治特殊研究【Advanced Research in Comparative Politics】　２／Research on Comparative Political Analysis
